creator: Built with you in Mind
descriptionHtml:
The Admoni Application is a platform for businesses to advertise on phones the way this works is that there are image adverts shown at specific intervals which are:

Admoni is the only app that gives you virtual coins when you make calls, put calls on hold and hang up. Users will need to allow adverts to earn virtual coins in wallet which can be redeemed for calls and data.

Admoni Coins can be exchanged for value from August, 2020; so earn as much as you can till then.

More info
* Contains ads
* Ads are placed by the developer
descriptionShort: Earn Admoni Coins via video adverts, outgoing and incoming calls.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: New UI Changes and System Notifications

title: Admoni

creator: AD-MONI INVESTMENTS CO. LTD
descriptionHtml:
Admoni is a rewards and discount application - Our partners offer Admoni discounts for sending you their way, and Admoni share the discounts with you in the form of Admoni coins. Admoni facilitates monetization of rewards by allowing transfer of cash backed rewards earned amongst Admoni users.

Zero Fees on payment of daily bills and guaranteed discounts/savings.
Rewards in the form of cash backed Admoni coins for using the app in everyday transactions
Transactions include – mobile airtime, utility bills, ride sharing apps

More info
* Contains ads
* Ads are placed by the developer
descriptionShort: Admoni is a rewards and discount application

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: * Bug Fixing.

title: Admoni

creator: AD-MONI INVESTMENTS CO. LTD
descriptionHtml:
Admoni is a reward and discount application for frontier markets. Admoni aggregates discounts and rewards for users in specific regions. And allows users redeem and earn further reward points as they engage using the app
Our partners offer you discounts with Admoni points as you engage their goods and services.

Get exclusive discounts when you spend your Admoni points on the App and at partner retail outlets.

In Addition you can redeem your Admoni points and get cash back on the best deals and offers.

APP FEATURES




TOP DEALS



Access top discounts on data , internet , cable tv and electricity bill subscription offers from Admoni partners on the App and at on-site retail stores


REFER-A-FRIEND



Invite friends to download and sign-up and get rewards with bonus Admoni points


DAY -TO -DAY RETAIL BRANDS



Easy Access to your favourite service providers to make spending your Admoni Points simple and easy


ADMONI POINTS



Access your Admoni Points balance, Spend history and track brands to see their latest offers & deals.

Note -

Admoni may use your location to help you connect with brands and services to redeem your Admoni points in retail outlets.
descriptionShort: Admoni is a rewards and discount application

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
* UI fixes and performance optimisations
* Improvements and Bug fixes

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
- New Interface design for good user experience.
- Transferring of tokens from one user to another user.
- New funding of wallet feature.
- New QR Code check out at partners store.
- In-App Video - Watch In-App videos from our discount partners and earn rewards
- Play Mobile Games.
- Improved stability and bug fixes.

- Transferring of tokens from one user to another user.
- New funding of wallet feature.
- New QR Code check out at partners store.
- In-App Video - Watch In-App videos from our discount partners and earn rewards
- Play Mobile Games.
- Improved stability and bug fixes.

title: Admoni

creator: AD-MONI INVESTMENTS CO. LTD
descriptionHtml:
Admoni is a reward and discount application for frontier markets. Admoni aggregates discounts and rewards for users in specific regions. And allows users redeem and earn further reward points as they engage using the app
Our partners offer you discounts with Admoni tokens as you engage their goods and services.

Get exclusive discounts when you spend your Admoni tokens on the App and at partner retail outlets.

In Addition you can redeem your Admoni tokens and get cash back on the best deals and offers.

APP FEATURES



TOP DEALS



Access top discounts on data , internet , cable tv and electricity bill subscription offers from Admoni partners on the App and at on-site retail stores


REFER-A-FRIEND



Invite friends to download and sign-up and get rewards with bonus Admoni tokens

DAY -TO -DAY RETAIL BRANDS



Easy Access to your favourite service providers to make spending your Admoni Tokens simple and easy

ADMONI TOKENS



Access your Admoni Tokens balance, Spend history and track brands to see their latest offers & deals.

Note -

Admoni may use your location to help you connect with brands and services to redeem your Admoni points in retail outlets.
descriptionShort: Admoni is a rewards and discount application

- Transferring of tokens from one user to another user.
- New funding of wallet feature.
- New QR Code check out at partners store.
- In-App Video - Watch In-App videos from our discount partners and earn rewards
- Play Mobile Games.
- Improved stability and bug fixes.

Access top discounts on data , internet , cable tv and electricity bill subscription offers from Admoni partners on the App and at on-site retail stores


REFER-A-FRIEND



Invite friends to download and sign-up and get rewards with bonus Admoni tokens

DAY -TO -DAY RETAIL BRANDS



Easy Access to your favourite service providers to make spending your Admoni Tokens simple and easy

ADMONI TOKENS



Access your Admoni Tokens balance, Spend history and track brands to see their latest offers & deals.

Note -

Admoni may use your location to help you connect with brands and services to redeem your Admoni points in retail outlets.
descriptionShort: Admoni is a rewards and discount application
title: Admoni

creator: AD-MONI INVESTMENTS CO. LTD
descriptionHtml:
Admoni is a reward and discount application for frontier markets. Admoni aggregates discounts and rewards for users in specific regions. And allows users redeem and earn further reward points as they engage using the app
Our partners offer you discounts with Admoni tokens as you engage their goods and services.

Get exclusive discounts when you spend your Admoni tokens on the App and at partner retail outlets.

In Addition you can redeem your Admoni tokens and get cash back on the best deals and offers.
